Package controller

Class AllTreatmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AllTreatmentController
  • public class AllTreatmentController
extends java.lang.Object
    The AllTreatmentController contains the entire logic of the patient view. It determines which data is displayed and how to react to events.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AllTreatmentController()  

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void handleComboBox()
      Handles when an item of the combo box is clicked and filters the table view by the selection
      void handleDelete()
      Handles deleting a treatment with TreatmentDAO
      void handleMouseClick()
      Handles clicking a treatment in the table view
      void handleNewTreatment()
      Handles opening the new treatment view and gives an alert if no patient is chosen
      void initialize()
      Initializes the corresponding fields.
      void newTreatmentWindow​(Patient patient)
      Actually opens the new treatment view
      void readAllAndShowInTableView()
      Reloads the whole table view
      void treatmentWindow​(Treatment treatment)
      Opens the edit treatment view
